resources.string: This activity\'s content depends on the JSON transferred by the server. It usually contains list of particular playlists. The song which is playing now is displayed in the toolbar. I will use the Google gson library to parse JSON files from my server. I will process the audio files with Android Multimedia Framework. I will use two major classes in that framework: the MediaPlayer (the primary API for playing sound and video) and AudioManager (the audio source and output manager). I will download covers for albums by the Squareup\’s Picasso library. I will use the Toolbar widget to create a panel for showing info about the playing track and controls.
